body.name: Chicrug 4x6 Area Rugs for Living Room, Blue Memory Foam Rugs for Bedroom, Vintage Distressed Floral Medallion Print Indoor Floor Carpet Rug for Bedside Dining Room Decor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 36 mins
features: 【Room Attractive Decor 】The area rug is designed with exquisite floral medallion print, vintage style adds brightness to home. It is a great decoration for your room.

【Memory Foam & Non-slip Design】:The middle of the area rug adds a foam layer, which increases the thickness of it and better insulates the cold floor, while relaxing your feet and bringing comfort. The back of the floor carpet is designed with a rubber pattern, which increases the carpet anti-slip performance and makes it difficult to move .

【Functional Rug 】 The soft 4x6 area rug makes your room more comfortable and cozy. You can put it in front of the sofa in the living room, bedroom, dinning room, study room, laundry room, kitchen and cloak room, etc.The rich colors bright your room ,make you feel easy.
【Product Note】The washable room rug are packaged in half vacuum, when you receive the package, there may be wrinkled, Please lay it flat or roll it up for 2- 3 days. The carpet will be flat.

【Cleaning Tips】For daily cleaning, you can use a vacuum cleaner. For overall cleaning, you can use a machine wash, but it is not recommended to use the washing machine too often. If you want to use it for a long time, it is best to wash it by hand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The carpet has some unclear patterns in certain areas, it looks very unique. This area rug adopts a vintage style, so we have designed some vintage elements with slight and partial fading. It is more suitable to decor rooms. What's the material of this area rug ? The surface of the carpet adopts a printing process, adding memory foam in the middle of the rug to make it more soft, and using a non slip bottom on the back. How to clean this room rug ? For daily cleaning, you can use a vacuum cleaner or wipe clean. Machine wash as little as possible, carpet will last longer. What scenarios is this boho rug suitable for? It suitable for living room, bedroom, dinning room, study room, laundry room, kitchen and cloak room and more indoor space.
Chicrug Red Vintage Area Rug for Living Room, Memory Foam Rug for Bedroom, Distressed Floral Medallion Print Indoor Floor Carpet Rug for Dining Room Bedside Decor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it Beautiful prints!
reviews.reviewText: This rug went into my spare room pulled all carpeting up in all areas so I am going with luxury vinyl tile floors wasn't sure what size in all rooms but tried this one first. LOVE IT read directions and let this rug get to room temperature. So soft to sit and walk on. Will be ordering more and beautiful design and outstanding color love the backing. At this time no pad under it just the rug and its padding. My new floors hopefully in by Jan. But so far the rug is the winner. Have had several compliments. My 35 year old daughter sat and wrapped presents for Christmas and she was amazed at the comfort and quality. It is a spare room with chocolate brown in color for decor.( twin bed, cover, curtains etc) this rug color really pulled the room together. Love this rug. Very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks used, faded, it is soft but super thin. NOT worth the money. Poor quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure what to expect from this rug because of the low price, but it's great. It does have a no slip backing, so it stays put. The texture is something like a velour, very soft. The print is not perfectly even. There are spots where the design is not well inked, but it lends to an aged look. I love that it doesn't have longer carpet fibers to catch dirt. I did have to iron it extensively when I first opened it, but it smoothed out nicely and is a perfect addition to the living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not meet my needs
reviews.reviewText: The graphics on the product were great, but it was more like a yoga mat than a rug. It was a vinyl, shower curtain type of material. Looked fake and plastic on my carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More mauve than red.
reviews.reviewText: Soft and thin foam. Pretty, but color wasn't red and blue, more mauve and blue. Non skid back could be done better. Still slips a bit. We'll see how it holds up in my laundry room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They ended up being exactly what I needed them for.
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely not carpet, it's foam. But a very durable foam. I'm a dog walker and use carpet to cover the floor of the back of my truck for my pups, plus to save the original carpet underneath. Was disappointed when these were delivered and found out it wasn't carpet of any kind. But I used it anyway, and glad I did. It's better than carpet for my dogs! It's soft, and very durable and doesn't seem to get as dirty as regular carpet. I should mention I also used 1 inch foam gym tiles under these "rugs" but only as added protection for the trucks carpeting underneath. I'll be buying more when these ones get worn out, which seems like it will take a long while. Might just buy some and store them in case these are no longer available by then.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Received this product and quickly returned it. It came in a vacuum sealed bag so the folds will be difficult to get out. The color was faded due to packaging. It felt more like a bath mat, not an area rug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it all around!
reviews.reviewText: All is like described and much more, the gray is a true gray, and washable too? This one is a keeper.
